text: Ifeanyi George (22 November 1993 – 22 March 2020) was a Nigerian professional footballer who played as a striker. ==Career== Born in Umuahia, George played club football for Enyimba and Enugu Rangers. He earned two caps for Nigeria in 2017. ==Death== Ifeanyi was killed in a car accident on 22 March 2020 whilst traveling from Enugu to Lagos following the cancelation of the Nigerian league due to COVID-19. Ifenayi, along with teammate Emmanuel Ogbu and friend Eteka Gabriel, were reported to have crashed into an articulated vehicle. All 3 people in the car died at the scene. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigeria international footballers Category:Place of birth missing Category:Enyimba International F.C. players Category:Rangers International F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Road incident deaths in Nigeria
title: Ifeanyi George
